pages.text: The Magmacube Gall - a potion allowing the imbiber to unhesitatingly chase hellish fiends through fire and lakes of molten lava. This elixir bears a dire side effect - while rendering your flesh impervious to flame, it greatly burdens your body, making swift movement a near impossibility. Furthermore, the foul stench of burning will linger in your abode long after the brewing is done.

pages.title: Potion Crafting
pages.text: A peculiar yet potent blend of ingredients, allowing one to bathe in $(m)ho$() lava lakes.
